Container.Name: homeassistant
Container.Overview: [p][span style="color: #777;"]Home Assistant is open-source home automation that puts local control and privacy first. Powered by a worldwide community of tinkerers and DIY enthusiasts. Perfect to run on a Raspberry Pi or a local server.[/span][/p]

Config.Name: Debug
Config.Description: Choose wether to display all app logs in the docker logs

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
